summary: FAX URGE NHTSA TO TAKE EFFECTIVE ACTION TO PREVENT FURTHER POLICE OFFICERS DEATHS...*MR          FAX URGE NHTSA TO TAKE EFFECTIVE ACTION TO PREVENT FURTHER POLICE OFFICERS DEATHS AND INJURIES BY RECONSIDERING THE 10/03/2002 DECISION RE THE FORD CROWN VICTORIA POLICE INTERCEPTOR (CVPI) VEHICLES.  *MR  *JB
